name: You Had One Job (juleegh)
description:
Things have been ruff at the office, you have made too many mistakes. Your boss barks at you, and tells you that one more mistake and it's over.

No problem, mistakes are the ones that happen when the boss is looking. Write your emails and manage your stress level by playing, but don't let the boss discover you.

Click to switch Tabs, press space to write code and emails, click to draw art, and use the WASD keys to move the long cat.

Credits:

Cora - Main Programmer
Juliana Montes - Programmer & 3D Modeler
Raúl Blanco - Game Designer
Nicolás Trillos - Programmer & Sprite Artist
